title: Customized Anthropology Foundation Education Utilizing Digital Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Humanistic literacy and basic competency in utilizing online learning tools
context.additional_context: Customized learning combining anthropology fundamentals with project-based tasks in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically compare three or more cases using a cross-cultural analysis framework.
Learners can write reports interpreting cultural contexts by analyzing digital anthropology materials (videos, documents, images).
Learners can design and execute a cultural phenomenon investigation project through collaboration, and present the final outcomes.

resources: Cloud-Based Collaboration Tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
